Uses of Package
kulami.game

  • Packages that use kulami.game 
    Package Description
    kulami.control  
    kulami.game  
    kulami.game.player  
    kulami.gui  
  • Classes in kulami.game used by kulami.control 
    Class and Description
    Game
    The class Game represents the current state of a Kulami game.
  • Classes in kulami.game used by kulami.game 
    Class and Description
    CompPlayerAdapter
    The CompPlayerAdapter interface is implemented by classes that want to be notified when a CompPlayer has chosen its next move.
    GameObservable
    The GameObservable interface defines the methods that the Game class must implement for GameObservers.
    GameObserver
    Classes that want to be notified of game state changes have to implement this interface.
  • Classes in kulami.game used by kulami.game.player 
    Class and Description
    Game
    The class Game represents the current state of a Kulami game.
  • Classes in kulami.game used by kulami.gui 
    Class and Description
    GameObservable
    The GameObservable interface defines the methods that the Game class must implement for GameObservers.
    GameObserver
    Classes that want to be notified of game state changes have to implement this interface.
